page.title: 10RAMBLERS ASSOC. LETTER
page.content:
Dear Headmaster, Footpaths : Great Bolas & Eaton Upon Tern
It made me very sad to read in the Telford Journal newspaper that pupils from your school were unable to find the footpaths in Great Bolas and Eaton Upon Tern. I shoud add sad not at all suprised by your findings as the public rights of way in Shropshire are in terrible state. I have had an uphill struggle over fit to walk
If you let me know just what footpaths your pupils were trying walk/find and the nature of the obstructions they encountered I will task the council with trying to get them cleared.
I enclose a few leafts that your pupils may find interesting.
